entry.title: Hokkaido | A5 Wagyu Beef Whole Boneless Striploin Strip End
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Wagyu Shop
Type: Japanese Wagyu
Price: 799.00

One (1) whole Strip End.

  • Authentic A5 Graded Hokkaido imported from Japan.
  • Hokkaido Prefecture.
  • Certificate of Authenticity is included with every order.
  • Approximately 7 lbs.
  • Japanese Black cattle (Kuroge).
  • Temperature controlled standard overnight shipping.
  • This product ships frozen.
  • Thawing is normal during shipment.
  • Product of Japan.
  • For chilled product, please contact us.
  • View Shipping Information and select your desired delivery date at checkout

The Strip End of the Striploin is recognized by the connective tissue that runs through the middle of the loin. This connective tissue extends about 2 inches from the surface into the loin. Although some may consider the Strip End as an “off-cut”, with Japanese Wagyu, this matters far less due to the overall marbling and tenderness of the steak.

Poroshiri Wagyu from Hokkaido Prefecture

Poroshiri Wagyu derives its name from where Wagyu cattle are raised within Hokkaido Prefecture, Mount Poroshiri. Wagyu are raised and cared for on small farms by dedicated ranchers who have spent their entire lives providing Wagyu with the perfect environment. Hokkaido’s climate allows Wagyu to be raised in ideal conditions year round. Learn more.

  • View Shipping Information and select your desired delivery date at checkout.

 

Miyazakigyu

Miyazakigyu is Wagyu which must be raised and processed in Miyazaki Prefecture. It must also be graded A4 BMS 7 and above to meet the Miyazakigyu qualifications—otherwise, it is sold as Miyazaki Kensan Gyu or Miyazaki Wagyu. Miyazakigyu has won successive 1st Place awards in the 9th and 10th Japanese National Competitive Exhibition of Wagyu. 

Asia International, Inc. is the first officially recognized Miyazaki beef distributor in the United States. Miyazakigyu is the #1 Wagyu brand in Japan and is now being offered to online consumers.

Poroshiri Wagyu from Hokkaido Prefecture

Poroshiri Wagyu derives its name from where Wagyu cattle are raised within Hokkaido Prefecture, Mount Poroshiri. Wagyu are raised and cared for on small farms by dedicated ranchers who have spent their entire lives providing Wagyu with the perfect environment. Hokkaido’s climate allows Wagyu to be raised in ideal conditions year round. Learn more.

 One (1) individually packaged Ribeye Steak.

Enjoy a luxurious dining experience with this A5 Japanese Wagyu ribeye steak from The Wagyu Shop™. The ribeye cut is prized for its exceptional flavor and texture.

Our Japanese Wagyu steak is some of the most sought-after beef in the world. The luxurious meat comes directly from Japan, where it's raised on small farms according to the highest traditional standards; diet, exercise and environment are all under strict supervision to meet the lofty requirements of Japan's grading system for premium imported Wagyu.

Poroshiri Wagyu from Hokkaido Prefecture

Poroshiri Wagyu derives its name from where it originates from in Hokkaido Prefecture, Mount Poroshiri. Hokkaido's climate allows Wagyu to be raised in ideal conditions year-round. There, Wagyu is raised and cared for on small farms by dedicated ranchers who have spent their entire lives working with the cattle. Learn more.
